text: Idē (hajj)! Mariyu evaḍaitē allāh vidhin̄cina niṣēdhālanu (pavitra niyamānalanu) ādaristāḍō, adi atani koraku, atani prabhuvu vadda entō mēlainadi. Mariyu mī koraku idi varaku mīku (niṣid'dhamani) ceppa baḍinavi tappa, itara paśuvulannī dharma sam'mataṁ cēyabaḍḍāyi. Ika mīru vigrahārādhana vaṇṭi mālin'yaṁ nuṇḍi dūraṅgā uṇḍaṇḍi mariyu abad'dhapu (būṭakapu) māṭala nuṇḍi kūḍā dūraṅgā uṇḍaṇḍi
